## Validate.toConditionPriority() function

Converts a number to a [ConditionPriority](./ts-res.conditionpriority.md) if it is a valid priority.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toConditionPriority(priority: number): Result<ConditionPriority>;
```

the number to convert


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[ConditionPriority](./ts-res.conditionpriority.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [ConditionPriority](./ts-res.conditionpriority.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
